ComicInfo.Title: Invaders of Mars Chapter 6
ComicInfo.Summary:
The battle for Barsoom reaches its climax as John Carter and the villainous Captain Joshua Clark face off in a winner-take-all duel to the death! But even if John Carter triumphs, will he be too late to save his beloved Dejah Thoris? The critically acclaimed relaunch by writer Ron Marz and artist Abhishek Malsuni reaches the end of its first arc, and sets the stage for all the epic adventures to come!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Ed Benes & Dinei Ribeiro | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Bart Sears & Neeraj Menon | 2 | C/Var | Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino, Mary Sanapo & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D/Sub | Subscription Cover | Yonami & Aikau Olivia | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Bart Sears | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Ed Benes | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 7 |
